allow_primary.description: Indicates if the category allows primary assignment.

is_leaf.description: True if this is a leaf category (has no subcategories), false otherwise.

is_primary.description: True if this is considered a primary category.

level.description: The hierarchical level of the category.

mapping_enabledd.description: Indicates if mapping is enabled for this category. (Note: potential typo in original data: 'mapping_enabledd' instead of 'mapping_enabled')

name.description: The name of the category (e.g., 'Children Magazines').

parent_category_id.description: The ID of the parent category, if applicable.
